main event: A farmer near Peru, Nebraska observed a bright light high in the sky on December 3, 1951, which descended rapidly, hovered, and then ascended quickly before disappearing.
interesting points: The object was described as round or disc-shaped and made no noise during its operation., The sighting occurred at approximately 2:20 AM and lasted for a few seconds., The witness was alone at the time of the sighting., The object descended to an estimated 300 to 500 feet above ground level before hovering., There was an earlier report of a glowing orange object observed at a distance of about 3/4 miles, which was about 25 to 30 inches in diameter.
sighted object: bright light, round or disc-shaped object
